body_html:
hi @lebedov
while the PR looks fine, we dont see the value of adding PairwiseDistance into pytorch, as it is a trivial operation that can be written by the user in one line in their forward call.
Hence, we're closing the PR.
A better place would be to add it into your own utilities file.

body:
hi @lebedov 
while the PR looks fine, we dont see the value of adding `PairwiseDistance` into pytorch, as it is a trivial operation that can be written by the user in one line in their `forward` call.
Hence, we're closing the PR.
A better place would be to add it into your own utilities file.
